response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe will significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, the product is valued at $1,500,000 by many. Considering its immense potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in the product's ability to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you require any further information or demonstrations to help you make an informed decision. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
